page.title: 06Adult Activities in Balmullo
page.content:
There are not many organised activities for teenagers in the village and so most of them visit friends' houses and occasionally go to Cupar, Dundee or St. Andrews for entertainment.
For the adults in the village there is The Balmullo Inn, the Bowling Club, the Burns Club, the W.R.I. and the Senior Citizens Club. This last club meets in our school each Thursday afternoon for cards, dominoes, carpet bowls and a chat over a cup of tea. Popular hobbies among the adults are sport, T.V., D.I.Y., crafts and reading. People accept that a wide variety of entertainment/leisure activities is not possibe in a village of this size, and so they are prepared to travel to nearby towns or cities to use their facilities.
